amendment.description: Amendment provides that the reporting and consultation provisions of the bill shall also include the House Committee on International Relations and Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of May 5, 1998 to require that the annual reports contained in the bill also be submitted to the House International Relations Committee and the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
